named-query.name: BC_READ_SKU_AVAILABILITIES_BY_SKU_IDS
named-query.query: SELECT skuAvailability FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.inventory.domain.SkuAvailability skuAvailability WHERE skuAvailability.skuId in (:skuIds) AND skuAvailability.locationId is null

named-query.name: BC_READ_SKU_AVAILABILITIES_BY_LOCATION_ID_AND_SKU_IDS
named-query.query: SELECT skuAvailability FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.inventory.domain.SkuAvailability skuAvailability WHERE skuAvailability.skuId in (:skuIds) AND skuAvailability.locationId = :locationId
